name: Home Page
content:
Hello👋

My name is Hothaifa Jaber.

I am a Full Stack web developer.

I have enough experience in planning and developing projects to take them to the next level.

I can work with Laravel and modern web technologies to create powerful and scalable projects.

I am proficient in working with databases and Linux servers.


You can contact me via Telegram📩 and follow me on Twitter🐦. I usually share about Laravel and Vue.js, and web development in general.
If you have time, you can check out my profile on GitHub🚀.


Apart from programming, I enjoy playing video games, football, watching anime, and peace ✨
